tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Post Pregnancy Classes,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Had fantastic treatment with Aakash fertility centre. Thanks to Dr Jeyarani, who was so helpful and informative and discussed our plan in detail and was happy to answer any questions. We always felt so welcomed at the hospital and our appointments and a special thank you to Dr Niveditha who was regularly saw for appointments and were always so lovely. We are just over 12 weeks from our fresh embryo transfer and so excited. Thank you everyone at Aakash fertility centre......

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Good environment and nice staffs. So kind and caring to each patients. Valuable for my money and time.

Dr.Niveditha Kamaraj and her entire team (nurses, lab staff,etc) are all very professional and compassionate. They always made the experience as comfortable as possible. They all take the time to answer any questions and to make sure you are heard. I am truly grateful for all the attention and care they provided. Dr.NivedithaKamaraj and her team are amazing.
We were treated with care, compassion,which is exactly what is needed when going through fertility treatment. I am now 6 month pregnant
Aakash fertility centre are nothing but amazing. The staff are truly amazing,very friendly and approchable
We are married for 10 years.We took treatment for 8years outside in so many hospitals.But after coming to vadapalani branch Dr.Nivedita we got positive results
reply_text: Thanks For Your Valuable Feed back

review: We had a treatment this month and got positive results.It all happens due to Dr.Niveditha madam Aakash Fertility centre vadapalani
I wish this centre continued success and well being.i would like to thank Dr.Niveditha madam in Aakashfertilitycentre vadapalani
Doctor is very friendly. Listen to our problems and gives de right treatment.I would recommend the doctor.

Doctor is very friendly 
And she explain all the procedure very proper and professional thank you team for everything.
